const response = await client.search({
  index: "my_locations",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: {
        match_all: {},
      },
      filter: {
        geo_distance: {
          distance: "200km",
          "pin.location": {
            lat: 40,
            lon: -70,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
